text.content:
Hello all!

The full release of Starfinder Second Edition is fast approaching (July 31st), and with it we need to shake things up in the playtest module.

For those who have not seen our plans for the full release here is how it will work (As always with tech, this may change slightly due to technical limitations):

  • Pathfinder 2e and Starfinder 2e will be separate Foundry systems, each one with their own content and theming.
  • Starfinder 2e content will be available as a module for Pathfinder worlds, similar to how the playtest module works, but with only officially released content.
    • This module will be called Starfinder Anachronism
    • There will be a counterpart Pathfinder Anachronism module available for the Starfinder 2e system when it launches.
  • The Starfinder 2e system won't be ready on launch day, unfortunately, but we aim to have the anachronism module ready as close to launch as possible.
  • The playtest module will remain active for Tech Core content, but the content from Galaxy Guide and Starfinder Player Core will be removed from this module when Anachronism launches.
    • If you want to continue using the playtest rules for Starfinder Player Core classes instead of the release rules you will want to lock this module to prevent it from updating to the 8.0 release.
    • This module, like the Pathfinder Playtest module, will continue to hold playtest content, making it available to use in both Pathfinder and Starfinder games.
    • We are making sure that none of this breaks premium content modules. This means the creatures will remain, and we aren't going to remove the art files for anything from the module so you can still use those for your game.
    • You will need to remake your characters with the full rules. As normal, we don't change things on existing actors any more than is needed to keep them functioning with new code.

Have fun gaming!
